fields.description: Moving from TC to AC project.
fields.summary: [ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
fields.environment:
i am new for titanium app  development when trying to run android app  following error occurs app doesn't appear  but emulator launch 
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
[ERROR] :  Failed to install apk on "emulator-5554"
TRACE  | titanium exited with exit code 1

please help me for solve  this problem

comments.body:
Hi,
Could you please include more information about your test environment  and steps to reproduce ?
I recommend you to clean the project a build again .

Thanks
